song_lyrics: Guṇe dhīr gambhīr sāgar samā chho,
Karu vandanā, he Pramukhjī, tamārī... karu vandanā 1
Raho mān apmānmā aikya dhārī... karu vandanā 2
Aho anya kāje saho kashṭa kevā,
Param sādhutāe svayam mūrti dhārī... karu vandanā 3
Hade bhāvnā vishva kalyāṇkārī... karu vandanā 4
Nahī sādhano lesh kīdhā ame to,
Chhatā brahmanu sukh āpyu tame to,
Chhatī dehe amne maḷyā dhām dhāmī,
Karu vandanā sākshar gnān pāmī... karu vandanā 5
title: Guṇe dhīr gambhīr sāgar samā chho

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-3028: Sadhu Aksharjivandas

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
